description: The Ideal Solution for LCD ViewingShoot in Bright LightThis spring-loaded shade blocks sun and bright light to prevent harsh reflections and glare when shooting while viewing your camera's LCD screen. Perfect for use with cameras without viewfinders, including those with touch screens!Superior Screen ProtectionSlide-on design allows you to easily remove & attach the shade to your screen. When the shade is closed it provides extra protection for your LCD, especially when not in a case. Great for outdoor activities & professional photography.Three-step InstallationTake off the adhesive strip on the frame and carefully stick it around the screen of your camera. Place the adhesive screen protector on the LCD screen and smooth it out with the included squeegee to not leave bubbles. Simply connect the shade by sliding it onto the frame, which snaps for a secure connection.SpecificationsShade Dimensions: 2.5"W x 1.8"H x 3" diagonal.*Not intended for use with widescreen format LCD screens. Please check your screen's dimensions before purchase.*Flip-Out Screen Cameras: Once the adhesive frame is attached, the screen must remain in the outward facing position. Use the folded shade to protect the screen when the camera is not in use.Compatible With NIKONDSLR:D3 , D3S , D3X , D4 , D50 , D60 , D70 , D80 , D90 , D300 , D300s , D600 , D700 , D3000 , D3100 , D3200 , D5000 , D5100 , D5200 , D7000MICRO FOUR THIRDS:1 J3 , 1 J2 , 1 V1 , 1 J1 , 1 V2 , 1 S1COOLPIX:A , S3200 , S9050 , L110 , L610 , L810 , P7700 , P500 , P510 , AW100 , L20 , L22 , L24 , L26 , L28 , L100 , L120 , P100 , P300 , P310 , P330 , P810 , P7000 , P7100 , S6 , S7c , S30 , S50 , S50c , S51 , S51c , S52c , S230 , S610 , S610c , S710 , S1100PJ , S4000 , S4300 , S5200 , S6000 , S8000 , S8100 , S8200 , S9100 , S9300 , S9500And more Nikon models with a 3.0" screen
title: ENHANCE Universal 3" LCD Hood w/ Pop-Up Sun Shade & Screen Protector for Nikon D5100 / D3200 / D3100 / D5200 / D600 & More Digital SLR Models - Includes Card Reader & Cleaning Cloth
